description: Skills that specific tutorials teach, practice, and assess

tutorials.title: Set up development tools and workflow

teaches.label: Execute npm install to set up project dependencies
Read and interpret package.json scripts section
Start development server and navigate to localhost

evidence.what: Successful npm install output showing dependency installation
Project running at http://localhost:3000 or configured port
Explanation of what each script in package.json does

tutorials.title: Debug and activate dynamic content rendering

teaches.label: Inspect and modify CSS classes to change page behavior
Use browser developer tools to diagnose styling issues
Provide project-specific context when asking AI for help

evidence.what: Page before and after activating magic mode
Browser DevTools showing the CSS change made
AI conversation showing effective context provision

teaches.label: Modify HTML content while maintaining semantic structure
Work with CSS custom properties for consistent theming
Test layout changes across different screen sizes

evidence.what: Original vs customized content showing personal touches
Mobile and desktop views of customized content

teaches.label: Complete git workflow: add, commit, push with meaningful messages
Verify successful deployment and test live site functionality
Document technical decisions and learning outcomes

evidence.what: Clean commit history with descriptive messages
Updated README with project reflection and technical notes
